Text: I understand that you have written in your own language but how about having it translated also into English for those of us who do not speak your language?

Outlook Backup is a handy program to all your email quickly a (secure) backup and the backup can be taken back. Not only all of your emails but also mail accounts, address book, blocked senders lists, signatures, message rules and other settings of your email program are stored in a separate file so that when problems or soon about all your emails and settings available. 

The program is easy to use and has a simple user interface in the form of a wizard. In short, it can save all your emails and retrieve. After a crash or a reformat, you can simply restore the backup and you are back to work before you know it!
